alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 3:27PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson, northern Madison, southwestern Lowndes, southeastern Thomas and southern Brooks Counties through 415 PM EST... At 327 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Quitman to 8 miles north of Monticello. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Madison, Quitman, Dills, Grooverville, Cherry Lake, Everett, Hamburg, Pinetta, Lovett, Nankin, Empress, Clyattville, Blue Springs, Hanson and Ashville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
